hero.title: Elevate Solar Panel Efficiency with AI-Powered Drones
hero.subtitle: Maximize energy production, reduce maintenance costs, and accelerate ROI with our advanced fault detection technology

benefits.title: Benefits & Advantages
benefits.subtitle: Discover how our drone and AI-powered inspection services outperform traditional methods and deliver exceptional ROI.
benefits.approachDesc1: Traditional solar panel inspection methods are time-consuming, labor-intensive, and often miss critical issues that impact energy production. Our technology-driven approach revolutionizes this process with faster, more accurate, and more cost-effective inspections.
benefits.approachDesc2: By combining advanced drone technology with sophisticated AI analysis, we identify problems that would otherwise go undetected until they cause significant energy losses or catastrophic failures.
benefits.speedOurDesc: Rapid drone coverage of large areas
benefits.accuracyOurDesc: AI algorithms trained on millions of panel images
benefits.accuracyTraditionalDesc: Limited by human vision and fatigue
benefits.safetyOurDesc: No need to access hazardous areas
benefits.safetyTraditionalDesc: Workers on rooftops or in electrical areas
benefits.dataOurDesc: RGB + thermal imagery of all panels
benefits.reportOurDesc: Exact fault positions with severity ratings
benefits.energyOurDesc: Through early fault detection and repair
benefits.keyBenefitsSubtitle: Our technology delivers significant advantages across multiple dimensions
benefits.timeEfficiencyDesc: Reduce inspection time by up to 80% compared to traditional methods. Our drones can scan large installations in a fraction of the time required for manual inspections.
benefits.accuracyDesc: Our AI technology identifies faults with up to 99.7% accuracy, detecting issues that are invisible to the human eye, including microcracks and early-stage hotspots.
benefits.accuracyMetric: AI trained on millions of panel images
benefits.safetyDesc: Eliminate the need for personnel to access potentially hazardous areas or work at heights. Our drones safely navigate the entire installation without human risk.
benefits.costEffectivenessDesc: Our inspections deliver a strong ROI by preventing major failures, reducing maintenance costs, and increasing energy production through early intervention.
benefits.energyProductionBoostDesc: Customers typically see a 5-12% improvement in energy production after addressing the issues identified by our inspection and implementing our recommendations.
benefits.reportingDesc: Receive detailed reports with precise fault locations, severity classifications, and prioritized maintenance recommendations to optimize your resources.
benefits.reportingMetric: Interactive digital reports with exact coordinates
benefits.successStory: After implementing PATtechs' recommendations from a single inspection, we saw our energy production increase by 9.2% within the first month. The ROI was immediate, and the detailed fault mapping allowed us to optimize our maintenance team's workflow.
benefits.successStoryAuthor: - Michael Chen, Technical Director at GreenField Energy (25MW Solar Farm)
benefits.readyDesc: Contact us today to discuss how our drone and AI inspection services can transform your solar power plant's performance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content:
As a young and dynamic team, we produce innovative and reliable solutions in drone software technologies. With our autonomous flight systems and data processing software, we contribute to more efficient and sustainable operations in critical areas such as agriculture, environmental management, industry, and security.

We base our work on knowledge sharing and continuous development within the team. Our experienced engineers guide young team members, supporting their technical and professional development. Through this synergy, we produce stronger, more creative, and more effective technologies every day, reflecting our accumulated knowledge in areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, and software engineering in our projects.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content:
To be a leading technology company offering reliable, innovative, and sustainable solutions in drone software technologies on a global scale.

With our energetic team of young engineers, we quickly adapt to the latest technologies in the industry while maintaining a culture of continuous learning and development. Our developed software is designed not only to meet today's needs but also to provide intelligent solutions to future challenges.

Our goal is to add value to both our industry and society by developing environmentally conscious, user-focused, and high-tech projects. With the dynamism and innovative perspective of our young engineers, we aim to become a globally recognized brand in the technology sector.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Get in touch to discuss how our drone and AI inspection services can optimize your solar power plant's performance.

inspectionDuration.question: How long does a typical inspection take?
inspectionDuration.answer: The duration depends on the size of your installation. A 10MW plant typically requires 1 day for data collection, with analysis and reporting completed within 3-5 business days.

shutdown.question: Do you need to shut down the plant during inspection?
shutdown.answer: No, our drone inspections can be performed while your plant remains fully operational, causing zero production downtime.

faultTypes.question: What types of faults can your technology detect?
faultTypes.answer: Our system can identify hotspots, microcracks, soiling, bypass diode failures, cell degradation, PID (potential induced degradation), delamination, and various connection issues.

accuracy.question: How accurate is your fault detection?
accuracy.answer: Our AI algorithms achieve up to 99.7% accuracy in fault detection, significantly outperforming traditional manual inspection methods.

reports.question: What information is included in your reports?
reports.answer: Our comprehensive reports include precise fault locations, classification by type and severity, thermal and visual imagery evidence, performance impact estimates, and prioritized maintenance recommendations.

frequency.question: How often should we schedule inspections?
frequency.answer: We recommend quarterly inspections for optimal performance monitoring, though many clients opt for bi-annual inspections (spring and fall) at minimum. Specific recommendations can be provided based on your installation's characteristics and environmental conditions.
